description:
Ramos is the gym leader of the Coumarine Gym and he gives trainers the Plant Badge for defeating him. He often drinks tea as a way to calm himself.
He maintains the gym which is a very large tree. He weeds and prunes trees around his gym and sometimes asks visitors and challengers to assist him before their match like he did with Ash Ketchum. Despite struggling against Ramos`s Grass type Pok√©mon, Ash Ketchum managed to claim victory and get his fourth badge.
name: Fukuji
